sections.heading: Appeal; fees and costs; payment
sections.text: If an appeal is taken from the award of the appraisers by the condemnee and the amount of the final judgment is greater by fifteen percent than the amount of the award, or if appeal is taken by the condemner and the amount of the final judgment is not less than eighty

sections.heading: one fee, amount should be fixed as though services were performed by one attorney unless circumstances require services of two attorneys
